name: NCFM Capital Market (Dealers) Module
description: The NCFM Capital Market (Dealers) Module exam is one of the very important exams conducted by the National Stock Exchange. It’s useful for getting jobs in stock broking companies or for starting your own stock broking business and provides question bank support for preparation.

name: NCFM - Financial Markets : A Beginner’s Module
description: The NCFM Financial Markets – A Beginner’s Module is a basic and important exam conducted by NSE for anyone wishing to begin a career in financial markets, covering MCQ questions and offering a practice question bank with solutions.

name: NCFM Technical Analysis Module
description: The NCFM Technical Analysis Module exam is conducted online and covers technical analysis concepts useful for trading and investments, offering a practice question bank with explanations to aid preparation.

name: FIMMDA - NSE Debt Market (Basic) Module
description: The FIMMDA - NSE Debt Market (Basic) Module covers basic debt market concepts and question bank material to help practice for this certification, with a typical mock exam of 60 questions and explanations included.

name: NCFM Derivatives Market (Dealers) Module
description: The NCFM Derivatives Market (Dealers) Module covers derivative markets and practical questions, intended for those preparing for jobs in derivatives trading; includes mock practice questions with detailed solutions.

name: BSE’s Securities Market (BCSM) Module
description: This module is offered by the BSE on Securities Market; it’s included in the NCFM catalog as a related module with practice questions and exam preparation materials.

name: MCX – MCCP Exam
description: MCX Certified Commodity Professional (MCCP) programme practice tests are available that cover commodity markets and certification preparation questions.
